lead_paragraph: The bankruptcy auction of the Revel Casino Hotel that was scheduled for Thursday has been postponed until next week because lawyers need more time to review the bids made on the casino.

headline.main: Revel Casino Bankruptcy Auction Postponed a Week
headline.print_headline: Revel Casino Bankruptcy Auction Postponed a Week
